import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Footer from '../layout/Footer'; import Header from '../layout/Header'; import callApi from '../api/callApi'; class Chitietsach extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { sach: [], _id: '', ten: '', hinh: '', gia: '', noidung: '', namxuatban: '', } } componentDidMount() { var { id } = this.props.params; console.log(this.data); if (id) { callApi(`api/sach/${id}`, 'GET', null).then(res => { var data = res.data; console.log(res) this.setState({ _id: data.sach._id, ten: data.sach.ten, hinh: data.sach.hinh, gia: data.sach.gia, noidung: data.sach.noidung, namxuatban: data.sach.namxuatban, sachs: data.sach, }); }); } } onSave = (e) => { var { ten } = this.state; e.preventDefault(); var { id } = this.props.params; console.log(this.props) if (id) { callApi(`api/sach`, 'PUT', { _id: id, ten: ten }) } } render() { var { _id, ten, hinh, gia , sachs , namxuatban, noidung} = this.state; return (

C Ph Cng Tony

C i khi vo nhng thng nm bt u vo i, gia v vn ng r v li khuyn, khi rt nhiu d nh m thiu i phn nh hng, th CM HNG l iu quan trng bn tr bt u bc chn u tin trn con ng theo ui gic m ca mnh. C Ph Cng Tony l tp hp nhng bi vit ca tc gi Tony Bui Sng. ng nh tn gi, mi bi nh nhng nh mt tch c ph, m bn tr c th nhn ra mt cht g ca chnh mnh hay bn b mnh trong : T chuyn ln nh nh v bn thn gia bn b quc t, cho n chuyn nh nh nn ch nhng php tc x giao thng thng. Chng ti tin rng nhng ngi tr tui lun mang trong mnh kht khao vn ln v tm lng hng thin, v c nhiu cch ng vin h bin iu thnh hnh ng. Nu nh tp sch nh ny c th khi gi trong lng bn c tr mt cm hng tt p, nh tch c ph thm vo u ngy nng mi, th l nim vui ln ca tc gi Tony Bui Sng. Tony Bui Sng cng l tc gi ca Trn ng bng, tc phm hin bn hn 200.000 bn Trch on ...Tht ra Tony hiu v sao cc bc gio s tin s son sch phi a vo nhiu ni dung nh vy. Rt l tm huyt v ng trn trng. V ngy xa, kin thc rt kh tm. Nhiu iu hu ch ch nm trong sch, trong th vin cc thnh ph ln, cc trng cc vin i hc ln v ngi ta phi nh mi th, nn phi cng im cho hc sinh nng thn v t c hi tip cn kin thc. Nhng, by gi kin thc nm ht trn mng, trong file my tnh, truy cp l ra ngay, nn cc nc phi thay i chng trnh hc ph thng sau khi my tnh v internet ra i. Hc sinh ch cn nh nhng g ct li, v PHNG PHP tm kim ti liu. V ch ngha ri cng s rng ri theo thi gian, kin thc mi li b sung lin tc, nn phng php tm kim thng tin tt s gip ch cho cc bn trong cuc sng sau ny.
